channel.title: Report Groups on 0x000216

item.title: Solving the Puzzle: Exploring Report Options and Report Groups
item.description:
(UPDATED 8/9/2011) Thanks to Mariano Gomez for clarifying this! While user guides mention a 32-report limit per report group (e.g., Reports-Financial-Groups), you can easily create more groups to bypass this. However, a bigger issue arises with report options within a report. For instance, the “Reports-Financial-Trial Balance” might have 33 report options: [Image of Trial Balance Report window with 33 report options] If you then try adding some of these options, particularly the 33rd, to a new report group (“Reports-Financial-Groups”):..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/solving-the-puzzle-exploring-report-options-and-report-groups/
